mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cloud_caoping(cloud_caoping_id, emp_id, cloud_caoping_title, cloud_caoping_content,cloud_caoping_prices , cloud_caoping_guige_id, cloud_caoping_pic, cloud_caoping_type_id, cloud_caoping_use_id, cloud_caoping_address ,cloud_caoping_dateline , cloud_is_use, cloud_is_del, lat,lng,is_type,cloud_caozhong_type_id,cloud_caozhong_guige_id,cloud_jixie_guige_id,cloud_jixie_use_id) VALUES (#{cloud_caoping_id}, #{emp_id}, #{cloud_caoping_title}, #{cloud_caoping_content}, #{cloud_caoping_prices}, #{cloud_caoping_guige_id, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cloud_caoping_pic}, #{cloud_caoping_type_id, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cloud_caoping_use_id, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cloud_caoping_address}, #{cloud_caoping_dateline}, #{cloud_is_use}, #{cloud_is_del}, #{lat}, #{lng}, #{is_type},#{cloud_caozhong_type_id, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cloud_caozhong_guige_id, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{cloud_jixie_guige_id, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cloud_jixie_use_id, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select:
SELECT sn.*,le.emp_name as emp_name, le.emp_cover as emp_cover ,lggcp.cloud_caoping_guige_cont as cloud_caoping_guige_cont ,lusecp.cloud_caoping_use_cont as cloud_caoping_use_cont ,ltypecp.cloud_caoping_type_cont as cloud_caoping_type_cont
,lggjx.cloud_jixie_guige_cont as cloud_jixie_guige_cont ,lusejx.cloud_jixie_use_cont as cloud_jixie_use_cont
,lggcz.cloud_caozhong_guige_cont as cloud_caozhong_guige_cont ,ltypecz.cloud_caozhong_type_cont as cloud_caozhong_type_cont
from cloud_caoping sn LEFT JOIN lx_emp le ON le.emp_id = sn.emp_id LEFT JOIN cloud_caoping_guige lggcp ON lggcp.cloud_caoping_guige_id = sn.cloud_caoping_guige_id LEFT JOIN cloud_caoping_use lusecp ON lusecp.cloud_caoping_use_id = sn.cloud_caoping_use_id LEFT JOIN cloud_caoping_type ltypecp ON ltypecp.cloud_caoping_type_id = sn.cloud_caoping_type_id
LEFT JOIN cloud_jixie_guige lggjx ON lggjx.cloud_jixie_guige_id = sn.cloud_jixie_guige_id LEFT JOIN cloud_jixie_use lusejx ON lusejx.cloud_jixie_use_id = sn.cloud_jixie_use_id
LEFT JOIN cloud_caozhong_guige lggcz ON lggcz.cloud_caozhong_guige_id = sn.cloud_caozhong_guige_id LEFT JOIN cloud_caozhong_type ltypecz ON ltypecz.cloud_caozhong_type_id = sn.cloud_caozhong_type_id
where sn.cloud_caoping_id=#{cloud_caoping_id}
